channel.title: What should I do with my server machine?
channel.description:
What should I do with my server machine?
Well, I have an ubuntu 9.04 server machine in my closet, but I haven't really got any use for it right now. Anyone here have any ideas on what I should do with it?

item.title: What should I do with my server machine?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Mopman:

I would imagine its cheaper than OC-12 Unless you’re comparing it to OC-3, which isn’t really fair

OC3 (155 mbps) - $15,000/mo. ($97USD/mbps)
T3 (45 mbps) - $3,000/mo. ($67USD/mbps)

Perhaps you’re right. I was always told that T-n lines are over priced.

Read full topic
item.source: What should I do with my server machine?

item.title: What should I do with my server machine?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Mopman:

My point was, there is such a thing as T4, and its not particularly rare either

Fourth level 274.176 Mbit/s (DS4) (4032 Ch.)

Honestly never heard of anyone using this due to the high price over OC.

Read full topic
item.source: What should I do with my server machine?

item.title: What should I do with my server machine?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“blah bah7, post:12, topic:283606”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=374809.msg2826065#msg2826065 date=1245000615]
T3 is the highest rating of that technology; the next step is OC. If you don’t know what you’re talking about, don’t post.
[/quote]
Who cares? Its the idea of making money off of it, not whether I know what the hell I’m talking about -.-[/quote]
You do realize that a T1 line costs atleast 300USD/mo, and a low-level fiber OC line costs well over 1000USD/mo.

[quote=“Mopman, post:11, topic:283606”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=374809.msg2826065#msg2826065 date=1245000615]
T3 is the highest rating of that technology; the next step is OC. If you don’t know what you’re talking about, don’t post.
[/quote]

Actually, loads of people use your namesake, T4. If you don’t know what you’re talking about… :p[/quote]
My namesake doesn’t have to do with this technology.

Read full topic
item.source: What should I do with my server machine?

item.title: What should I do with my server machine?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:5, topic:283606”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=374809.msg2825418#msg2825418 date=1244944792]
Those can receive donations. You could also rent it out?
[/quote]
To Moparscapers.
Some would pay a ridiculous amount of money to get the “Pl0xage” server on a “VPS”[/quote]
If you don’t mind the occasional DDoS, of course.

blah bah7:

Host someones website for money. Make some money, buy a t3 cable, host more sites, buy a t9 cable, host more websites, and soon your making 200000$ a year

T3 is the highest rating of that technology; the next step is OC. If you don’t know what you’re talking about, don’t post.

Read full topic

Host something? …

SteamDS, BF2, etc?
[/quote]

I mean, what should I do with it that would be profitable in some way or another?[/quote]
Those can receive donations. You could also rent it out?
